list.name: Changes
list.comment: Updated view.py - Removed the separate Activity form logic (_render_activity_form, _clear_activity_form_callback). - Added the activity fields and dynamic generation logic into _render_edition_form. - Updated _clear_edition_form_callback to clear the new activity fields. - Updated state initialization.

task.summary: Default task
It showed an error in Streamlit UI, because of double button, i just removed it and script worked
added a native "required" field validation like in HTML
adding clear messgaes button
Added “🧹 Clear History” button without touching automation or logic flow
When Streamlit first starts (no history yet), the button should not be visible to keep the interface clean--> the script was done
Added icon in button
Added color of the text in button
Adding script of navigation to create edition of existed course
Added function for creation edition
Added function for creation edition
Removed edition creation script
Reorganised total logic due to the addition of the edition creation part.
Reorganised total logic due to the addition of the edition creation part.
Addition of the edition duration days
Updated logic according to addition of creation edition and Added of the edition duration days
Updated logic according to addition of creation edition -->another try
Another try --> Updated logic according to addition of creation edition
Another try --> Updated logic according to addition of creation edition
Last Another try --> updated logic according to addition of creation edition
Changing the text function in course creation which will disappear as soon as User type
Changing the text function in course creation which will disappear as soon as User type
Updated script choosing language, supplier, and price
1. Added mandatory input boxes during the filling the forms for edition and course. 2. Added description box for edition
Moved moderator type script inside of supplier condition
Speeded up the process of choosing aula (removing pause) and reversing the user input to lowercase to find the searching element even the user write name of aula in capitalised way.
IMPROVED SUPPLIER WORKFLOW: entire block has been updated to be faster and more reliable.
Updated placeholder in edition creation course with warning
The fix involves two simple but crucial changes: one in the view to send the correct data type, and one in the model to use the data correctly.
Modified the XPath in both functions to use normalize-space(.) = "{course_name}" instead of contains(...).
Modified the "Edition Title" an optional field that overrides the default naming convention.
Changed the input box placeholder message.
Updated the _render_edition_form function to remove the "Duration" input and replace it with a required "End Date" input.

Aggiornato il messaggio in fine. è leggermente diverso e più specifico in ogni caso, migliorando la chiarezza per l'utente.
- L'edizione 'Edizione titolo'... (L'utente vede confermato il nome che ha scelto).
- Una nuova edizione... (L'utente capisce che è stata creata un'edizione generica).
During the search to not have trouble with lowercase or capitalised letters --> added .lower () method
During the search to not have trouble with lowercase or capitalised letters --> added .lower () method
Deleted director "Draft.."
Adding 'pulisci'button
Updated script 'pulisci'button. Now is everything working. But streamlit shows warning aboout 2 conflicting sources of truth for a widget's value
Fixed streamlit warning aboout 2 conflicting sources of truth for a widget's value

Added new automatation logic for creating activity: 1. A new public method create_activities that the presenter will call. This method handles the full flow (login, find course, find edition, loop and create activities). 2.A new private helper method _open_edition_from_list to find the specific edition you want. 3.create_single_activity function, converted into a private class method _create_single_activity.

Added the new form and its logic. This includes: 1. Initializing new state variables in `__init__`. 2. Adding a new container to `render_ui`. 3. Creating the new `_render_activity_form` method, which will dynamically generate inputs based on a number input. 4. Creating the `_clear_activity_form_callback`. 5. Updating `update_progress` and `show_message` to handle the new `"activity"` form type.
Added the new run_create_activities method to handle the logic for the third flow.
Updated the main controller logic to recognize and dispatch the new RUNNING_ACTIVITY state.
ADDED NEW STATE FOR ACTIVITY FORM
1`_clear_activity_form_callback`: Added the new key to the clear logic. 2.`_render_activity_form`: Added the new "Edition Publish Start Date" input field and validation logic.
Replacing the simple _open_edition_from_list with a new, robust _search_and_open_edition function that performs the search

1. Updated the `__init__` Method Added the default value for the activity date to your `__init__` function. This will set the initial value for the widget in session state, creating a single source of truth. 2. Updated the `_render_activity_form` Method: Removed the hardcoded default `value` from the `st.text_input` call. The widget will automatically read its value from `st.session_state` using its `key`.

Updated `model.py`: - The `create_edition` method now accepts the list of activities and loops through them *after* saving the edition details. - The `_create_single_activity` helper is updated to accept times and includes a placeholder for your future input. - Removed unused methods (`create_activities`, `_search_and_open_edition`).

Updated view.py - Removed the separate Activity form logic (_render_activity_form, _clear_activity_form_callback). - Added the activity fields and dynamic generation logic into _render_edition_form. - Updated _clear_edition_form_callback to clear the new activity fields. - Updated state initialization.

MESSAGE.value: Moved moderator type script inside of supplier condition
Speeded up the process of choosing aula (removing pause) and reversing the user input to lowercase to find the searching element even the user write name of aula in capitalised way.
IMPROVED SUPPLIER WORKFLOW: entire block has been updated to be faster and more reliable.
Updated placeholder in edition creation course with warning
The fix involves two simple but crucial changes: one in the view to send the correct data type, and one in the model to use the data correctly.
Modified the XPath in both functions to use normalize-space(.) = "{course_name}" instead of contains(...).
Modified the "Edition Title" an optional field that overrides the default naming convention.
Changed the input box placeholder message.
Updated the _render_edition_form function to remove the "Duration" input and replace it with a required "End Date" input.

Aggiornato il messaggio in fine. è leggermente diverso e più specifico in ogni caso, migliorando la chiarezza per l'utente.
- L'edizione 'Edizione titolo'... (L'utente vede confermato il nome che ha scelto).
- Una nuova edizione... (L'utente capisce che è stata creata un'edizione generica).
During the search to not have trouble with lowercase or capitalised letters --> added .lower () method
Deleted director "Draft.."
Adding 'pulisci'button
Updated script 'pulisci'button. Now is everything working. But streamlit shows warning aboout 2 conflicting sources of truth for a widget's value
Fixed streamlit warning aboout 2 conflicting sources of truth for a widget's value

Added new automatation logic for creating activity: 1. A new public method create_activities that the presenter will call. This method handles the full flow (login, find course, find edition, loop and create activities). 2.A new private helper method _open_edition_from_list to find the specific edition you want. 3.create_single_activity function, converted into a private class method _create_single_activity.

Added the new form and its logic. This includes: 1. Initializing new state variables in `__init__`. 2. Adding a new container to `render_ui`. 3. Creating the new `_render_activity_form` method, which will dynamically generate inputs based on a number input. 4. Creating the `_clear_activity_form_callback`. 5. Updating `update_progress` and `show_message` to handle the new `"activity"` form type.
Added the new run_create_activities method to handle the logic for the third flow.
Updated the main controller logic to recognize and dispatch the new RUNNING_ACTIVITY state.
ADDED NEW STATE FOR ACTIVITY FORM
1`_clear_activity_form_callback`: Added the new key to the clear logic. 2.`_render_activity_form`: Added the new "Edition Publish Start Date" input field and validation logic.
Replacing the simple _open_edition_from_list with a new, robust _search_and_open_edition function that performs the search

1. Updated the `__init__` Method Added the default value for the activity date to your `__init__` function. This will set the initial value for the widget in session state, creating a single source of truth. 2. Updated the `_render_activity_form` Method: Removed the hardcoded default `value` from the `st.text_input` call. The widget will automatically read its value from `st.session_state` using its `key`.

Updated `model.py`: - The `create_edition` method now accepts the list of activities and loops through them *after* saving the edition details. - The `_create_single_activity` helper is updated to accept times and includes a placeholder for your future input. - Removed unused methods (`create_activities`, `_search_and_open_edition`).

Updated view.py - Removed the separate Activity form logic (_render_activity_form, _clear_activity_form_callback). - Added the activity fields and dynamic generation logic into _render_edition_form. - Updated _clear_edition_form_callback to clear the new activity fields. - Updated state initialization.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Updated view.py - Removed the separate Activity form logic (_render_activity_form, _clear_activity_form_callback). - Added the activity fields and dynamic generation logic into _render_edition_form. - Updated _clear_edition_form_callback to clear the new activity fields. - Updated state initialization.
